Name: Village Warrior
Description: Become a warrior of the Fallen Kingdom
Author: PresDaGod
NotCompleted: &cYou are already a warrior of Fallen Kingdom.
SendMessage: &cYou need Mines II to start this quest

Dialog.Tiny Tim: Welcome to the royal barracks!
Recently as you may have heard, the kingdom has been under siege by the cursed monsters of this land
These monsters continue to defeat my men Tiny Time and Tiny Time again.
We need new warriors to join our ranks in the hopes to defeat them
Are you willing to pick up the mantle to defend this marvelous kingdom?
A shame... We really could have used someone like you
The King thanks you for your service to defending the crown
Before we release you into the battle fields, we must make sure you are prepared to fight
We have discovered that in the mines there are weaker versions of the mobs that are attacking the kingdom
Go there and take out &625 Shamblers&f. Return to me once it is finished for your next task.
Ah you have returned young warrior!
I see you have completed your first task with ease. But it is not over yet
For your second task you will return to the mines, but this Tiny Time your task is to take out &630 Goblin Grunts&f.
You are showing real talent young warrior. No one else has ever completed these tasks as fast as you have.
I have yet another task for you to accomplish.
Head into Mines II and take out &640 Goblin Archers&f.
You are doing quite well, only a couple more tasks left for you.
The kings guard is having trouble with their weaponry breaking, iron weapons are just not cutting it anymore
Head into the mines and fetch &664 Gold Ingots&f.
This is perfect, the King will be pleased.
For your final task head into the mines once more and kill &650 Crawlers&f.
Young warrior, you have exceeded all expections I had of you before.
It is my honor to pronounce you a warrior of Fallen Kingdom.
Soon you will be called upon by the King. In the meanTiny Time, prepare yourself for what is to come.
